name: 5 minute heroes
description:
5 Minute heroes

Control an army with 5 different class of heroes to defeat the enemies! You are going to fight against 9 waves of enemy, while enhancing your units within a total enhancing time of 5 minutes in each wave. Build your strategy to win ! Do not forget to upgrade your army with upgrade points after each wave.

===

Sorry for the update after weekly game jam 113 deadline ! I made a mistake that it deletes my submitted version (when I want to upload a separated latest version) so I re-uploaded it with tiny bug fixes ...
